We find you better deals and similar items compared to those at Facebook marketplace

For every item we search and find the best alternative so you could make an informed decision when you decide to make a purchase 

Facebook marketplace is filled with dropshippers and flippers who resell items with a mark up, at some cases you can find similar brand new items at the same cost or even cheaper 

In other cases some items have clearance sales on other websites like amazon or aliexpress

Dealmatch is not perfect but we're doing our best to find you alternatives to save you money :)
